thanks!

```suggestion
@[simp, norm_cast]
```
and everywhere else
Done.
We don't have this for `Subgroup`. Can you add it?
We already have [Subgroup.opEquiv](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Algebra/Group/Subgroup/MulOpposite.html#Subgroup.opEquiv) unless I mistake something.
Indeed, I missed it

```suggestion
def opOrderIso : Subalgebra R A â‰ƒo Subalgebra R Aáµáµ’áµ– where
```
But it's called [Submonoid.opEquiv](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Algebra/Group/Submonoid/MulOpposite.html#Submonoid.opEquiv) for Submonoid, etc.
Uh, okay ðŸ˜¦
`Î¹` should be a `Sort*`
Done.
